alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otter Tail County through 530 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Underwood, or 11 miles east of Fergus Falls, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ottertail Lake, Battle Lake, Underwood, Dalton, Clitherall, Vining and Amor. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 58 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail
